text: JUST POSTED ADD ON: Readers Guide to"RED DAWN" Emails. Vital historical documents that give unvarnished guide to pandemic of 2020 in the US.  Researchers will turn to them for decades to come. Not the nightly WH news conferences. Read them yourself. https://t.co/5NWdk5TQCo
